alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Perry (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 05 at 9:28AM CST until February 07 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Mississippi... Leaf Near Mclain affecting Greene, Perry and George Counties. For the Leaf River...including Mclain, New Augusta...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Leaf Near Mclain. * WHEN...Until Monday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CST Saturday the stage was 20.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:15 AM CST Saturday was 20.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 20.5 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late Monday morning. - Flood stage is 18 feet. - www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
